column1: #text=I had some sore muscles so I decided to take a bath .
#text=First , I showered to get the dirt off me .
#text=Then I stepped over to the bathtub and stopped the drain .
#text=I turned the faucet on its hottest setting .
#text=As the steamy water was running , I opened my bathroom cabinet and found a box of bubble soap .
#text=I poured a little bit of the powder into the tub and the water started to foam up .
#text=The bubbles smelled like lavender and it was very relaxing .
#text=When the tub was filled , I turned off the faucet and stepped away to give the water a chance to cool off a bit .
#text=I found my magazine and poured myself a glass of juice .
#text=I tied my hair into a ponytail and got a towel and my robe and slippers to put next to the tub for when I was ready to get out .
#text=It felt warm but not too hot .
#text=I slipped my body under the foam and relaxed .
#text=I read my magazine and soaked in the lavender bubbles .
#text=When the water started to get too cold , I stood up and grabbed my towel .
#text=I patted myself dry and then put on my robe and slippers .
#text=I pulled the drain from the tub and let the water go down .
